explains: n. 共谋；串通；共犯关系

sentences.en: Recently a number of policemen were sentenced to death for their complicity in the murder.
sentences.cn: 近来很多警察因参与这起谋杀而被判死刑。

sentences.en: Yet France has veered from complicity to confusion.
sentences.cn: 但是法国却从与别国串通一气转向了混乱。

sentences.en: No one can force you, without your complicity, to not enjoy.
sentences.cn: 没你的同意，没人可以组织你去尽情享受。
